source: TEXT_STMBDZ401_02724_SEQ_00<tab>Fukata hopes you enjoy foul odors.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ401_02724_SEQ_00<tab>玄水連山のフカタは、冒険者に頼みたいことがあるそうだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ401_02724_TODO_00<tab>Sprinkle the bucket of smelly liquid at the designated locations.

TEXT_STMBDZ401_02724_FUKATA_000_000<tab>Hello there, traveler. I require your help if you have the time. While I belong to the Doman Liberation Front, I am also a proud resident of Namai with my own responsibilities to the village.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ401_02724_FUKATA_000_000<tab>よお、アンタが敵じゃないことはわかってるさ。
オレはナマイ村の村人であると同時に、反乱軍の一員でもあってな。
不信な輩が近づかないように、この泉を見張っているのさ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ401_02724_FUKATA_000_001<tab>I have been told to guard this spring and under no circumstances am I to leave my post. However, there is another job related to the village I need to take care of.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ401_02724_FUKATA_000_001<tab>けど、それゆえに困ったことがあってな。
ここから目を離すわけにいかないから、
やっておきたい仕事ができないんだよ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ401_02724_FUKATA_000_002<tab>I was hoping you might do it in my stead. Here, take this liquid and sprinkle it around that area over there. You have my thanks!
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ401_02724_FUKATA_000_002<tab>そこでなんだが、オレの代わりに、
この「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8D4101 /var>」を、辺りに撒いてきてほしいんだ。
あとでお礼はするから、よろしくな！

source: TEXT_STMBDZ401_02724_FUKATA_000_010<tab>Pray sprinkle that liquid around that area over there. You have my thanks!
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ401_02724_FUKATA_000_010<tab>「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8D4101 /var>」を、辺りに撒いてきてほしいんだ。
あとでお礼はするから、よろしくな！

TEXT_STMBDZ401_02724_FUKATA_000_020<tab>おっ、もう「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8D4101 /var>」を、撒き終わったのか？
助かったぜ、ありがとうな！

source: TEXT_STMBDZ401_02724_FUKATA_000_021<tab>No doubt you are wondering just why that liquid smells so foul. Well, it is made from a mix of pungent ingredients: animal innards, resin, and garlic to name but a few. It does a fantastic job of keeping the beasts at bay.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ401_02724_FUKATA_000_021<tab>あの液体は、魚のハラワタや松脂、ニンニク……
つまりは、くっさいものをアレコレ混ぜたお手製の液体でな。
撒けば、魔物の類いが寄り付かなくなるらしいんだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ401_02724_FUKATA_000_022<tab>One of my friends in the Ala Mhigan Resistance taught me how to make it. Oh, and you will want to give your clothes, let us see...three <var 1A 02 /var>thorough<var 1A 01 /var> scrubbings ought to do it.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ401_02724_FUKATA_000_022<tab>反乱軍の仲間が教えてくれた知恵さ。
……そうだ、あとで服を洗っておくといいぜ。
その悪臭が、こびり付いちまったら嫌だろ！？
